title: Your Pets are like Family Here! We love dogs and cats! 2 Bed, 1 Bath
posting_body: ['Community Location:', '1 Magnolia Circle - Jonesboro, GA 30236', 'Rental Information:', '$1332/Month | 2 Bedroom 1 Bath | 850 sq ft', 'Leasing Options:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, Shopping', '− Controlled Building Access', '− Gorgeous Pool', '− Online Services', '− On-Site Professional Staff', '− Picnic Areas with BBQ Grills', 'Description:', 'Tara Bridge Apartments boasts Amenities that make living here both comfortable and convenient.', 'Work out in our fitness center, relax by the pool or enjoy a game of tennis on the tennis court.', 'A spacious sunning deck perfect for grilling or picnicking is available.', 'You can also enjoy a leisurely walk around the community as it is nestled amongst canopies of trees and other natural surroundings.', 'Welcome home to the open airy feeling of this floor plan, featuring a HUGE master bedroom and bath.', 'Pets:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Please call our Leasing Office for complete Pet Policy information.', 'Call:', 'Tara Bridge Apartments at', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '9AF5CE3A158F441']
